szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.intrfc.arena.game.actorManager

Interface ActorManagerUpdatable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ActorManagerBasic
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActorGameInterface, ActorManagerPrivileged
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActorGameProxy, ActorManager

    public interface ActorManagerUpdatable
extends ActorManagerBasic
    Extension of the basic interface for the Actor manager object. This interface is designed to be exposed to game actors.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerActor(ActorPrivileged actor, java.lang.Runnable action)
      Registers an actor, thereby adding the actor to the game level.
      void unregisterActor(ActorBasic actor)
      Unregisters an actor (removing from it from the game, in the sense that its act() method is no longer called), Note that the actual implementation can use late removal to prevent ConcurrentModificationException.

      • Methods inherited from interface szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.intrfc.arena.game.actorManager.ActorManagerBasic

        getActors, getActorsBySearchCriteria, getActorsByType, getPositionToActorsMap

    • Method Detail

      • registerActor

        void registerActor(ActorPrivileged actor,
                   java.lang.Runnable action)
        Registers an actor, thereby adding the actor to the game level. Also optionally sets a method (an action) that is to be called (performed) when the actor given as argument is unregistered, that is, removed from the game level.
        Parameters:
        actor - Not Null: The actor to add to the game level.
        action - Optional: The action to be performed when the actor is unregistered, Must be a reference to a method returning void and taking no arguments or null if nothing is to be performed on a given actors removal.

      • unregisterActor

        void unregisterActor(ActorBasic actor)
        Unregisters an actor (removing from it from the game, in the sense that its act() method is no longer called), Note that the actual implementation can use late removal to prevent ConcurrentModificationException. Optionally also executes a method that is to be called when the actor is unregistered if such a method has been set, otherwise it does nothing.
        Parameters:
        actor - Not Null: The actor to remove
